entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3 except zero near the Alberta border.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this morning then light this afternoon. High minus 3 except zero near the Alberta border. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18 except minus 12 near the Alberta border.

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 2.
